opendmx

Class OpenDmx

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendmx.OpenDmx

  • public class OpenDmx
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to interact directly with OpenDMX hardware connected to a Windows machine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenDmx(int device_number)
      Constructs an OpenDmx object on the given device number.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int close()
      Closes the currently open OpenDMX devices.
      int sendData(byte[] data, int len_data)
      Sends data to the OpenDMX device.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenDmx

        public OpenDmx(int device_number)
        throws FTDIException
        Constructs an OpenDmx object on the given device number. If you only have 1 OpenDMX device connected, then you should just input 0.
        Parameters:
        device_number - number of the connected OpenDMX device. Input 0 if you have only 1 such device.
        Throws:
        FTDIException

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public int close()
        Closes the currently open OpenDMX devices.
        Returns:
        An error code. Returns FTDI_D2XX.FT_OK if everything is fine, otherwise an error. See FTDI_D2XX class.

      • sendData

        public int sendData(byte[] data,
           int len_data)
        Sends data to the OpenDMX device.
        Parameters:
        data - An array of data for channels 1->N, where N is no greater than 512.
        len_data - The number of bytes to send, read from the beginning of the array. Must be between 0 and 512
        Returns:
        An error code. Returns FTDI_D2XX.FT_OK if everything is fine, otherwise an error. See FTDI_D2XX class.
